name: icon sets
description: upload, save and reuse custom icons directly from the icon picker. check out the [icons page](https://notion-enhancer.github.io/mods/icon-sets) for instructions on loading entire sets.

options.label: load default icon sets from github
prevent icon quality reduction
options.tooltip: **this may break icons in widgets** - encodes and submits images as data urls to prevent notion from optimising them (reduces image quality by ~20%)
